text: The Cuniculitremaceae are a family of fungi in the order Tremellales. Cuniculitrema, the teleomorphic taxon, is known in southern Germany and Switzerland, while the anamorphic taxa (Fellomyces, Kockovaella, and Sterigmatosporidium) have a wider distribution. The four genera of the family Cuniculitremaceae have a combined total of 25 species. ==References== Category:Tremellomycetes Category:Basidiomycota families
title: Cuniculitremaceae
